description: Listed only by Wedgwood, who says: Realistic hail-storm effects, secured by means of a rotating drum filled with peas. Messrs. Maskelyne & Cooke, of recent years, have used similar devices at the Egyptian Hall, Piccadilly, W. St. Sulpice, Paris (formerly). Bibliography Wedgwood[1]: Grêle.
